oshiSkill.name: ("Purple Mic")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If your Center holomem is Purple, their Arts gain +20 power until the end of this turn.

spOshiSkill.name: ("Card Change")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Draw 2 cards from your Deck, then Archive 1 card from your hand..

name: Yuzuki Choco
extraEffect: You may put any number of copies of this holomem in your Deck.

name: Yuzuki Choco
collabEffect: If your Oshi holomem is Purple, draw 1 card from your Deck.

name: Yuzuki Choco
collabEffect: You may Archive 1 card from your hand for the following effect: reveal an Event with #Food from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

name: Yuzuki Choco
bloomEffect: You may return a non-LIMITED Event card from your Archive to your hand.

skills.description: Restore 20HP to one of your Back holomems.

name: Yuzuki Choco

skills.description: You may return one Event with #Food from your Archive to your hand: if you do, this Art gains +20 power.

extraEffect: When this holomem is Downed, lose 2 LIFE.

skills.description: For each Event card you've played during this turn, this Art gains +40 power.

name: Oozora Subaru
collabEffect: If your Center holomem is Yuzuki Choco, you may send one Cheer from your Archive to any of your holomems.

name: Himemori Luna
collabEffect: Look at your holo power cards, reveal one, and put it into your hand. Then put a card from your hand into your holo power.

name: SubaChocoLuna
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems named <Oozora Subaru>, <Yuzuki Choco> or  <Himemori Luna> and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: Choco's Omurice
ability: Choose one of your holomems. That holomem recovers 20 HP. If there is a holomem with #Cooking on your Stage, the chosen holomem's Arts gain +20 power until the end of this turn.

name: Chocolat
ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to <Yuzuki Choco>, it gains the following effect: when the holomem that this Mascot is attached to Blooms, restore 20 HP to that holomem.You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.
